ComicInfo.Title: Itâ€™s in the Bag; Spies!; Cool it, Coldheart!; The Terrible Machine; The Birthday Surprise; Computa Cat
ComicInfo.Summary:
After failing to master a heavy boxing bag, Heathcliff removes his gloves and destroys it with his claws.
A Russian spy disguises himself as a dog who happens to look exactly like Top Dog and infiltrates the local defense plant.
Alien invaders land on Endor, planning to cut down the entire forest where the Ewoks live.
Iggy and Heathcliff find a ring that turns out to be the stolen Devil Stone Diamond, but they don't find out until they have given it to Marcy as a birthday present, and the police are accusing Heathcliff of being the cat burglar who stole it.
The Nutmegs buy a robot cat that can do everything Heathcliff does, only better.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Angelo De Cesare,Lennie Herman,Wilf Prigmore,Dave Manak,Dick Malmgren,Michael Gallagher,Angelo De Cesare,Lennie Herman,Wilf Prigmore,Dave Manak,Dick Malmgren,Michael Gallagher
